Truth Scholar Devianne:
Let me properly introduce myself. I'm Devianne. Something is getting in the way of you becoming an Archmage, so I was investigating disguised as Magister Justin of Goddard Castle Town. The real Justin may be back by now. I was right! Grand Magister Valleria was behind it! You showed up just as I found out the truth. You saw her in disguise.
"Go on."
